subject: Baseball
Series
lead_paragraph: For all the injury and indignity that come with squatting behind the plate, what the catcher does with a bat in hand is how he is measured — in the eyes of fans, and in the checkbooks of owners.
snippet: For all the injury and indignity that come with squatting behind the plate, what the catcher does with a bat in hand is how he is measured — in the eyes of fans, and in the checkbooks of owners.
